meanings.definition: A type of hat with a flat brim and an adjustable strap at the back.
meanings.sent1: He wore his favorite snapbacks to the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of snapbacks on display.
meanings.sent3: The snapbacks decided to have a party on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her snapbacks were like colorful shields against the sun.
meanings.sent5: The snapbacks lined up neatly on the rack, waiting to be chosen.

meanings.definition: A sudden, sharp sound made by something breaking or closing quickly.
meanings.sent1: The snapbacks of the twig echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The snapbacks of the door startled the cat.
meanings.sent3: The snapbacks played a tune as the wind blew through the cracks.
meanings.sent4: The snapbacks of the ice cracking sounded like music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The snapbacks of the fireworks lit up the night sky with excitement.

meanings.definition: A quick, sharp movement or action.
meanings.sent1: With a snapbacks, he caught the falling glass before it shattered.
meanings.sent2: The snapbacks of the dancer's feet were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The snapbacks of the squirrel made it look like a tiny superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her snapbacks in the game were swift and precise, earning her victory.
meanings.sent5: The snapbacks of the whip cracked loudly in the air, signaling the start of the race.
